SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.plot_luminosityfunction¶

SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.plot_luminosityfunction(path, database, redshifts, band, out_folder, solid_angle=1638.0, ymin=1000, ymax=2000000, xmin=0.5, xmax=100, nbins=10, sigma=5.0, H0=70.0, WM=0.28, zmax=9.0)¶
Parameters:
  • solid_angle – area of the sky survey in arcmin**2 GOODS = 160
  • sigma – sigma level of the errors to be plotted
  • nbins – number of bins (for simulated data)
